short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for botz capture and recorder services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BotzAutomation extension to capture web applications Object locator information. It auto connect with the BotzAutomation UI.  Information related to the selected objects are seamlessly captured. This will be enabling the user to automate tasks quickly.
